input: sentence 1: My meeting started at 4:00 and I needed to catch the train at 4:30, so there wasn't much time. Luckily, it was short, so it worked out. [SEP] sentence 2: The train was short, so it worked out.

sentence 1: It is not easy to space buttonholes exactly the same distance apart, and it is very difficult to cut them precisely the right size. sentence 1: Bernard, who had not told the government official that he was less than 21 when he filed for a homestead claim, did not consider that he had done anything dishonest.
